item.title: Exposing build metadata in your Dropwizard webservice
item.description: Exposing metadata from the jar manifest in Web Service In my current job we develop as a continuous delivery process - meaning every build is a artifact that can potentially be deployed to production. Therefore we do not version our software anymore - we stick to the snapshots. The question arises - how do we keep track of what is deployed to production? Deployment happens a lot (i.e. daily), so doing this manually is cumbersome and prone to errors.
